entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as the one who gave Katie a necklace. He is described as having a conversation with Borgin at Borgin and Burkes.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as receiving a necklace from Draco Malfoy.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is described as rubbing his nose in apparent embarrassment next to Harry.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is described as shuffling her feet and trying to put distance between herself and Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who accuses Draco Malfoy of giving Katie a necklace. He also tells Professor McGonagall about following Malfoy to Borgin and Burkes.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is the one who responds to Harry's accusation with a shocked pause and asks for proof.

entities.name: borgin
entities.description: Borgin is mentioned as having a conversation with Draco Malfoy at Borgin and Burkes.

entities.name: burgin and burkes
entities.description: Borgin and Burkes is the location where Harry followed Malfoy and overheard their conversation.
